title: One Ring Circus - Dispatches from the World of Boxing - Gooner
description:
One Ring Circus - Dispatches from the World of Boxing (2009).pdf Gooner

Publisher: Schaffner Press, Inc. (May 1, 2009)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0980139422
ISBN-13: 978-0980139426

Published together for the first time, this anthology of essays on boxing covers the sport in all its forms and at its many levels. Written in bestselling author Katherine Dunnâ€™s characteristic vernacular, these pieces range from portraits of legendary fighters such as Sugar Ray Leonard, Roberto Duran, Marvin Hagler, and Mike Tyson to the unsung stories of trainers, amateurs, promoters, cutmen, and a pair of pugilistic priests. Spanning 30 years and including all who make up the vibrant boxing world, this compilationâ€”from one of the most original voices in American sports literatureâ€”finely elevates the sport and communicates its beauty, passion, and character
